remarks: Value of the uncurry functor on an object.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Jan-2017.)
statement:
uncfval.g $e |- F = ( <" C D E "> uncurryF G ) $.
uncfval.c $e |- ( ph -> D e. Cat ) $.
uncfval.d $e |- ( ph -> E e. Cat ) $.
uncfval.f $e |- ( ph -> G e. ( C Func ( D FuncCat E ) ) ) $.
uncf1.a $e |- A = ( Base ` C ) $.
uncf1.b $e |- B = ( Base ` D ) $.
uncf1.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
uncf1.y $e |- ( ph -> Y e. B ) $.
uncf1 $p |- ( ph -> ( X ( 1st ` F ) Y ) = ( ( 1st ` ( ( 1st ` G ) ` X ) ) ` Y ) ) $.
